item.description:
Living as a Master in the Fifth Dimension
with Elizabeth Foley


Saturday, February 4, noon-5 $80
Register by calling Judy at 781-639-1236
During this powerful workshop you will learn self-empowerment techniques  designed to enhance your connection to your Higher Self. Learn what is a Master, what is the fifth dimension, introduction to the universal laws and how they are the key to mastery in the fifth dimension, balancing the mental and emotional bodies, working with the electromagnetic gridline, understanding the universal language of light and working with sacred symbols as you journey to the higher realms of consciousness.
Elizabeth is an international angelogist and spokesperson for the celestial hierarchy. She facilitates unique spiritual workshops and is the owner of Divine Healing n Nashua NH. www.divinehealing.us/

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Living as a Master in the Fifth Dimension
